title: Hebrew Wedding Monogram
content:
Hey,

I need some help. Im working on a wedding monogram for a couple and I don't really feel the current design. They really like it, but in my infinite difficultness it doesn't work for me, so I wont give it to them yet. I have made about 30 other compositions but they like this the best.

I am requesting two things; Some critique and maybe a suggestion of a nice classy Hebrew serif font that looks similar so I can try to hash this out in Illustrator.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [elanrachel.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120218013814/http:/typophile.com/files/elanrachel.jpg) | 40.58 KB |
author: HebrewHammer

comments.content: p.s. I know the letters are iffy, I'm more concerned about the composition.
See one of my fonts -- Veer.com: [Shirah 25](http://web.archive.org/web/20120218013814/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000260)
Thats perfect. The lamed is beautiful. I made a mock up and if they like it I'll buy the font and do it right. Thank you so much.
